humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the report, one sentinel lymph node was examined and no tumor was found in it (0/1). Based on the new rule 11, N0 can indicate that all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that one sentinel lymph node was excised and examined, and no tumor was found (0/1). This is consistent with an N0 stage, which means no regional lymph node metastasis.
